resources.string: Intermittent Fasting Lifestyle - Timer and Tracker
The timer will track your eating window. You are not allowed to eat outside of this time frame!
Set the duration of your eating window:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this eating window ?
More and more research is showing that Intermittent fasting can help you lose weight and increase your energy!
As the saying goes:\n What gets measured gets improved!\nWe can help you with Calendars, Lists and Charts.

You should consult your physician or other health care professional before starting this or any other fitness program to determine if it is right for your needs. This app is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Use at your own risk.
